name: salonMonster online booking app
author: salonMonster software

sections.description:
This plugin makes it easy to add your salonMonster.com online booking into your WordPress site.

With salonMonsterâ€™s easy online booking your clients can book 24/7 so you donâ€™t miss out on potential bookings and clients are saved the inconvenience of voice mail, busy phone lines or being put on hold.

The app automatically sends out email & text reminders so you donâ€™t have to, leaving you more time to focus on what you love, doing hair.

Try the salon management app from salonMonster.com for free to see what it can do for you.
sections.installation:
1. Go to your salonMonster.com account and navigate to “Settings” > “Online Booking”
  2. Copy your salonMonster web address from that page
  3. Open wordpress
  4. Click on salonMonster in the menu
  5. Paste in your salonMonster booking page address (URL)
  6. Save
  7. Use [salonmonster] shortcode to add online booking to any page of your wordpress site

sections.changelog:
1.1

Now scrolls the parent page to the top when a user proceeds to the next booking step. This helps make it easier for users to book without unnecessary scrolling.

1.0

Monster’s first WordPress plugin release
